title: Floyd Mayweather HOF, Steve VM, Junior Sidepiece Tips, Shoutouts and more.
itunes:title: Floyd Mayweather HOF, Steve VM, Junior Sidepiece Tips, Shoutouts and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Junior has a question for Steve that is still tied to what had happened at Bishop T.D. Jakes birthday party.  Sleeping in bed with mom age cutoff is the first problem today for The CLO.  Congrats on being inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame Mr. 50-0!  Today is Election Day for Maine, Nevada and South Carolina.  Our folks from Detroit and Boston left some voice messages.  Golden State pulled it off.  Steph went 0-9!  Junior lays out the rules and regulations of this situationship we got here.  Would You Rather had its challenges involving star B-ball players.  Big ups to Minnesota Fattz and WDAS.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve shows us how to get blessed.  Have faith and show willingness to work.  BOOM!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Good morning and welcome to the ride!  Junior has a question for Steve that is still tied to what had happened at Bishop T.D. Jakes birthday party.  Sleeping in bed with mom age cutoff is the first problem today for The CLO.  Congrats on being inducted into the International Boxing Hall of Fame Mr. 50-0!  Today is Election Day for Maine, Nevada and South Carolina.  Our folks from Detroit and Boston left some voice messages.  Golden State pulled it off.  Steph went 0-9!  Junior lays out the rules and regulations of this situationship we got here.  Would You Rather had its challenges involving star B-ball players.  Big ups to Minnesota Fattz and WDAS.  Today in Closing Remarks, Steve shows us how to get blessed.  Have faith and show willingness to work.  BOOM!
